attributes.review: My fellow trump supporters DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP. After downloading this it asks for your phone number, soon after I was getting super weird spam calls from Russia. My private emails got hacked. The information in the app is all wrong too super sketch do not download!!
attributes.title: HACKS YOUR INFO

attributes.review: This app took 20 hours to download it is so slow and then once it downloaded my phone kept freezing I gave my phone a virus worst app I’ve ever gotten I would not recommend do not download
attributes.title: Do not download

attributes.review: I am very disappointed with the layout and the accessibility of this app. I am disappointed that a administration as good as President trumps would come out with some thing that doesn’t work. I am still going to vote for Trump 2020 but they better get this app fixed or I am going to call someone in charge. I can’t wait to go out to the polls after I walk my goldfish. #Karen’sForTrump
attributes.title: Disappointed and not a snowflake

attributes.review: wow . i really can’t even think of the words to describe how this makes me feel .. but don’t worry they’ll come to me . i am so very disappointed and taken back by apple for even allowing this to be on the App Store . not only was a greeted by a picture of a dusty Cheeto with feathers on his head - I WAS NEARLY BLINDED BY IT ! BLINDED I TELL YOU . I simply don’t see how this could even be legal. I was wearing my favorite shirt today and it was RUINED because I was so in shock for seeing that thing on my screen . even my dog ran away from it .
attributes.title: you’d be absolutely bonkers to consider getting this app

attributes.review: This app is awful. It made my phone crash, and I can’t seem to delete it. I wonder if it’s sending my data to Russia....
attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD

attributes.review:
So, I was addicted to crack for a long time and my peers on rehab suggested this app because we all love trump so much. However after looking through this app my views have changed tremendously! I am now apart of the “radical left” because I can see that Trump has not upheld any of his promises and he has made this country WORSE!! He is also a rapist, sexist, racist and a pedo. He should NOT be in office!! 

Sincerely, 
A sane human being (kind of)
attributes.title: Horrible

attributes.review: This app made me cry, it’s very bad. Would not recommend.
attributes.title: Annoying Orange

attributes.review: I visited the White House to save daddy barron but donals took a big dump on my car and called me the n word 😡😡😡 never going back again hope anonymous gets rid of him but whatever 🥳🥳🥳
attributes.title: no thanks 💫💫💕🥳💅😍
